live_updates: Our teams are looking into it. We estimate service will be restored by 10:24 AM. Please stay tuned for updates.
37435.summary: Some customers in Northeast area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
37435.title: May 18 - Calagary (Northeast) | All Services - Outage (Fix in progress)
